title: (x) Peroni typeface / flare serif - (similar to) Flange {Florian}
content:
Any ideas what the typeface of Peroni Nastro Azzurro is?  
 [http://www.creativematch.com/newsfiles/peroni.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20101116183616/http:/www.creativematch.com/newsfiles/peroni.JPG "http://www.creativematch.com/newsfiles/peroni.JPG")

Cheers, guys!
author: Lasse Kristensen

comments.content:
Hi Lasse,

I think this is a modified [Flange](http://web.archive.org/web/20101116183616/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DPERONI%2520NASTRO%2520AZZURRO%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D26).  
F
I reckon the Peroni / Nastro Azzurro logo is substantially older than this font â€¦
Why? The company/brand is older, but the logo?
